data.name: onboarding.ui.page.first.content
data.value: Gabber projects define a set of textual topics to structure the audio recording.Projects are created on the Gabber website for the mobile experience focus on the capturing

data.name: onboarding.ui.page.second.content
data.value: Add participants whose experience you want to capture. Once recorded, participants become members of the project and will receive an email to review their consent for how their recording should be used

data.name: onboarding.ui.page.third.content
data.value: Project topics appear in a list to structure the audio recording. These can be tapped to tag the audio from the last time a topic was tapped. This creates regions on top of the audio that are used to identify what is being discussed in the recording.

data.name: onboarding.ui.page.fourth.content
data.value: Once a recording is uploaded all participants will receive an email where they can review the audio and their consent for how their recording will be viewed, used and shared within the Gabber Project.

data.name: login.api.error.NO_INTERNET
data.value: You are not connected to the internet.

data.name: login.api.error.AUTH_INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: You have provided an incorrect password for that email.

data.name: login.api.error.AUTH_USER_404
data.value: There is no registered user with that email address.

data.name: register.api.error.AUTH_INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: You have provided an incorrect password for that email

data.name: register.api.error.AUTH_USER_404
data.value: There is no registered user with that email address"

data.name: register.verify.ui.page.content
data.value: Please confirm your email address by tapping the button in the confirmation email we sent you.

data.name: register.verifying.activity.label
data.comment: Appears in Android application list when a button is clicked for a gabber url, i.e. in an email.

data.name: register.verifying.ui.page.content
data.value: Verifying your account. This may take a moment.

data.name: register.verifying.api.error.ALREADY_VERIFIED
data.value: Your account has already been verified. Try logging in instead.

data.name: register.verifying.api.error.AUTH_TOKEN_404
data.value: There was an error veryifing your account. Try logging in or resetting your password instead.

data.name: register.verifying.api.error.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED
data.value: The URL in the link you clicked has expired. Try logging in or resetting your password instead.

data.name: projects.ui.instructions
data.value: Gabber project structures an audio conversation using a set of textual topics to tag the audio during recording. These structural tags are used to simplify viewing and reuse of the audio on the website.

data.name: sessions.ui.header.instructions
data.value: Upload your Gabber for others to listen, annotate and learn from the experiences you captured.

data.name: sessions.ui.body.instructions
data.value: There are no Gabber recordings to upload.

data.name: sessions.ui.message.upload.fail
data.value: Failed to upload. Try again soon.

data.name: about.ui.content
data.value: Gabber is a digital workflow for structuring, capturing and creating conversations on audio recordings. The mobile application is used to structure and capture these conversations, and the website is used for viewing and commenting on the structured audios.

data.name: participants.ui.validation.noneselected
data.value: At least one participant must be selected

data.name: participants.ui.validation.oneselected.message
data.value: Are you sure that you only want to select one participant?

data.name: recording.ui.instructions.header
data.value: Topics below are used to guide and structure the Gabber recording. Select a topic you are currently discussing, and other topics as the conversation changes.

data.name: recording.ui.instructions.footer
data.value: Select a topic to begin recording

data.name: recording.ui.permission.body
data.value: Microphone access is required to record a Gabber

data.name: recording.ui.dialog.finish.title
data.value: Are you sure you want to end this recording?

data.name: recording.ui.dialog.back.body
data.value: If you go back the recording will not be saved.

data.name: debriefing.ui.page.first.content
data.value: Thanks for recording your Gabber. Once you upload the recording we will send you an email to review the recording and provide consent.

data.name: debriefing.ui.page.second.content
data.value: {0} will receive an email to review and provide consent for the Gabber recording. Once a decision on consent is made others may access the recording on the Gabber website.

data.name: debriefing.ui.page.third.content
data.value: If all participants consent, your Gabber becomes available for other project members to listen, annotate and learn from the experiences you shared.
